title: Kodama Yuki Tanpenshuu
original_name: マンゴーの涙 小玉ユキ短編集
sinopse:
A two volume publication of short stories and oneshots.

Book One - Mango No Namida:

1. Mango no Namida (マンゴーの涙)
2. Shiroi Hana no Shishyuu (白い花の刺繍)
3. ROVER (ローバー)
4. Tamago Ouji (玉子王子)
5. Yuuutsu Yamaraaji (憂鬱ヤマラージ)
6. Kakigori (かきごり)

Book Two - Beautiful Sunset:
1-2) Beautiful Sunset 3) Zakuro (柘榴) 4) Sakuranbou no Utage (さくらんぼうの宴) 5) Manindensha no Susume (満員電車のススメ) 6) Yubikiri (ゆびきり)

(Source: MU)
